properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA out 20 NM; Calcasieu Lake; Waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX out 20 NM; Waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA from 20 to 60 NM; Vermilion Bay; Coastal waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM; Waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX from 20 to 60 NM; Sabine Lake
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 10 at 4:01PM CST until February 12 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to one mile or less.

* WHERE...Portions of and the coastal lakes and bays of the Gulf
of Mexico.

* WHEN...Until noon CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY
